title: please help!
body:
hi riot/gms/ppl

im asking this because i been playing all day long on my off day from work and i just didnt see any normal ranked game on ive been waiting for ranked games this all week and i just dont  see the normal ranked button for que

here is apicture from my account please help:

http://i.imgur.com/TWHVjLz.jpg

replies.body:
As *Bluebonquet* mentioned, your normal ranked solo *draft pick* is available there at the top. If you were looking for ranked teams queue, that's only available on [this schedule](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209964886-Ranked-Teams-Schedule).

Let me know if you have any questions.
I'm not really sure what you are asking, you said "normal ranked game" there is only a Ranked Draft Pick which is here http://prntscr.com/c2e3v7
